site_name: Berkeley Hotel 40 Wilton PlaceLondonSW1X 7RL
description: Variation of condition 1 of permission dated 3 October 2019 (RN:17/06350/FULL) for 'Demolition and redevelopment of 33 to 39 Knightsbridge and north (Knightsbridge) wing of Berkeley Hotel to provide buildings of four basements, ground and part nine part ten upper floors to Knightsbridge frontage and an additional storey to the existing hotel building fronting Wilton Place to provide 59 additional hotel bedrooms with upgraded guest and staff facilities including new restaurant, 13 residential apartments (8 x1-bed, 3 x 2-bed and 2 x 3-bed), retail along Knightsbridge frontage and use of existing NCP car park for hotel and private car parking.'  Namely, to vary the approved drawing numbers to allow amendments to the design of the ground floor facades, including increased window size to the north-west and south-east corners and extension to the south-west corner.
